statements: DELETE FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND click_through_rate > 0.5;
DELETE FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversions < 10 OR roi < 0.1;
DELETE FROM campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5;
DELETE FROM ad_performance WHERE performance_id IN (SELECT performance_id FROM ad_performance WHERE conversions < 5);
DELETE ad_campaigns, ad_performance FROM ad_campaigns INNER JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id WHERE ad_campaigns.end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM roi WHERE revenue < cost
DELETE FROM ad_clicks WHERE viewer_id = 100 AND device_type = 'mobile';
DELETE FROM Conversions WHERE ad_id = 500 AND user_id = 1002
